page.title: 05Life in Crockenhill today
page.content: The Petty family (father, mother, son aged 5 and daughter aged 4) live in a semi-detached house backing onto farmland.Mr Petty commutes to work by car, acts in local productions and enjoys playing golf.Mrs Petty is a housewife and takes an active part in amateur dramatics, she is also interested in fine needlework.Their home contains a number of modern domestic appliances such as a microwave oven, automatic washing machine, tumble dryer and a video recorder.James the son goes to Crockenhill primary school and Hazel attends the local playschool.The children go swimming regularly at Swanley and go to the Sunday school. They enjoy the village atmosphere of Crockenhill, its proximity to London, the motorway network, and the sports and large shopping centres.
